column1: Does the founder hold an advanced degree from a prestigious institution?
Has the founder served in a senior leadership role at a major company?
Did the founder co-found the company with a small team?
Has the founder previously worked full-time at a moderate number of companies?
Has the founder's previous startup experience included any acquisitions?
Is the founder based in California?
Does the founder have experience in the biotechnology sector?
Has the founder completed an MBA or similar advanced business degree?
Has the founder held a director-level role at a public tech company?
Is the founder known for having a strong personal brand and media presence?
